meanings.definition: A device used for cutting extremely thin slices of material for examination under a microscope.
meanings.sent1: The ultramicrotomes carefully sliced the tissue samples for the scientist to study.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use ultramicrotomes to cut tissue samples into thin sections for analysis.
meanings.sent3: The ultramicrotomes decided to have a race to see who could slice the thinnest piece of material.
meanings.sent4: Her precision with the ultramicrotomes was like a skilled chef slicing a delicate piece of sushi.
meanings.sent5: Using ultramicrotomes is like wielding a microscopic sword to reveal hidden details.
